text:
What you've described does sort over overlap into DMP but those are also really solid skills to have that will set you apart from people who don't have those skills.
If you have a comp heavy reel then I feel you're still showing you're qualified for a paint role

That’s true. As I wait for responses I’ve been asking seniors that I met through training or through networking if they have any old assets or footage I can use to practise on and potentially put on my reel. Cleaning up wires and so on. Gotta stay proactive and all that.
Hopefully by Bring your own Animation I will have new work to show and critique
Ace! I think it's on the 21st this month
